snippet.title: Kingdom Eighties - Official Animated Intro Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the cool animated intro from Kingdom Eighties, the upcoming adventure game coming in 2023.

The relentless Greed never stop in their effort to steal the Crown of Creation... not even in the Eighties! A Kingdom love letter to those days of bikes, summer camps, and sitting around in your pajamas on a Saturday morning in front of the TV.

#GameTrailers
